name: Tactical Miscalculation
book: Pathfinder Player Companion: Pathfinder Society Primer © 2013, Paizo Publishing, LLC
text: The target becomes fixated on avoiding damage and fails to spot even the most opportune moments to attack. Whenever a creature the target threatens would provoke an attack of opportunity from the target, the target must succeed at a Will save or be unable to make the attack of opportunity against that creature.
text_zh: 目标会在最适合攻击的时候也执着于避免伤害，当一个目标威胁的生物激起了目标的借机攻击时，目标生物必须通过一个意志豁免，否则无法对该生物进行借机。
